rows.label: qst104202_msg0001
rows.name:
The school repairs are on track,
I see. Now for the next task!

rows.label: qst104202_msg0002
rows.name:
Gather the most talented
teachers from all over Alst!

rows.label: qst104202_msg0003
rows.name:
Language! From reading and writing
to understanding texts...

rows.label: qst104202_msg0004
rows.name:
I want them to grow into children
who can empathize with others.

rows.label: qst104202_msg0005
rows.name:
Science! From how things
work to the calculations
needed for business...

rows.label: qst104202_msg0006
rows.name:
I want them to learn the
wisdom needed to live.

rows.label: qst104202_msg0007
rows.name:
History! Our present is
built upon the past.

rows.label: qst104202_msg0008
rows.name:
I want them to learn from successes
and failures, to serve as a guide
for their own paths.

rows.label: qst104202_msg0009
rows.name:
I apologize for this unreasonable
request, but I'll leave the choice
of who to recruit up to you all.

rows.label: qst104202_msg0010
rows.name:
I'll leave the choice of who
to recruit up to you all.

rows.label: qst104202_msg0011
rows.name:
You've met more people from various
places than I have... I trust you.

rows.label: qst104202_msg0101
rows.name:
We could have villagers teach, but
I want to make a school on par with
Acedia's theological school.

rows.label: qst104202_msg0102
rows.name:
A place where one day, children from
all over Alst will gather in Iyasaki
Village, wanting to learn...

rows.label: qst104202_msg0201
rows.name: Excellent!

rows.label: qst104202_msg0202
rows.name: So, where are these teachers?

rows.label: qst104202_msg0203
rows.name:
Oh, so they'll come as
soon as they're ready.

rows.label: qst104202_msg0204
rows.name:
Hmm... I heard you had
returned to the village
and jumped to conclusions.

rows.label: qst104202_msg0205
rows.name:
I assumed you'd brought
the teachers with you...

rows.label: qst104202_msg0206
rows.name:
...so I gathered the children to
have them start lessons right away.

rows.label: qst104202_msg0207
rows.name: Mmm, a misstep on my part.

rows.label: qst104202_msg0208
rows.name:
But I have a brilliant
idea! How about Rex-sensei
gives a practice lesson?

rows.label: qst104202_msg0209
rows.name:
He's this village's
biggest success story!

rows.label: qst104202_msg0210
rows.name: I'll call the children over now!
